# commodities

This command allows users to quickly and easily retrieve an overview of Futures and commodities. It provides the last price and change for the day.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/econ commodities
```

---

## Parameters

This command has no parameters



---

## Examples

```
/econ commodities
```
